v0.1.6, 2014-08-12 -- Don't close empty requests
v0.1.5, 2014-01-29 -- Increase mozpoolclient's timeout

                   -- Add method query_device_state to utilize mozpool api by same name
v0.1.3, 2013-02-13 -- We were setting assignee always to an incorrect value.

                      fixes. 
v0.1.1, 2013-01-30 -- Use setup from setuptools + point to main Mozpool repo
